skills.name: BORE
desc: • Deals 2 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• 30% Chance to Remove One Beneficial Effect per hit.
• Damage dealt increases based on off your DEF stat.

skills.name: SPLICE
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Damage dealt increases based on off your DEF stat.

skills.name: BURROW
desc: Inflicts Silence on enemies at the start of battle for 1 turn.
